recaps.Prologue: Waxillium Ladrian, a Roughs lawman, hunts a dangerous criminal, showing the grit of frontier justice.
recaps.1: Wax returns to Elendel after years away, confronting the life of a noble he left behind.
recaps.2: Wax struggles with noble duties and old instincts as rumors of strange crimes surface.
recaps.3: Wayne’s arrival brings levity and reminders of the life Wax thought he’d left.
recaps.4: Wax finds his new life complicated by a betrothal arrangement and unresolved feelings.
recaps.5: A shocking robbery interrupts Wax’s attempt to settle into noble society.
recaps.6: Wax digs into the investigation, finding clues pointing to a dangerous new gang.
recaps.7: The Vanishers strike again, pushing Wax closer to his lawman instincts.
recaps.8: Marasi steps into the picture, eager to help Wax understand the case.
recaps.9: Wax, Wayne, and Marasi start piecing together the gang’s movements.
recaps.10: Tension rises as the Vanishers’ targets grow bolder.
recaps.11: Wax confronts nobles for information, drawing resistance.
recaps.12: Wayne’s antics lead to insights, and Wax begins to see a larger pattern.
recaps.13: Ranette arms the team, adding deadly tools to their pursuit.
recaps.14: Wax’s investigation turns personal as the stakes escalate.
recaps.15: The Vanishers’ crimes intensify, spreading fear in Elendel.
recaps.16: Wax struggles to balance his lawman instincts and noble obligations.
recaps.17: An ambush reveals the Vanishers are more organized than imagined.
recaps.18: Marasi’s resourcefulness helps the group find their next lead.
recaps.19: Wax and Wayne close in on Miles’s network.
recaps.20: The conflict between Wax and Miles becomes inevitable.
recaps.21: Miles’s plot deepens, and Wax pushes toward a final confrontation.
recaps.22: The Vanishers’ plans start to unravel under Wax’s pursuit.
recaps.23: A daring rescue brings revelations and danger.
recaps.24: Loyalties are tested as Wax and his allies press forward.
recaps.25: The investigation collides with Wax’s family ties.
recaps.26: Miles and his lieutenants make their last, boldest moves.
recaps.27: Wax and Wayne face a deadly showdown.
recaps.28: The dust settles as the truth behind the crimes is fully revealed.
recaps.29: New questions emerge as Wax reflects on what the future may hold.
